33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"The world shall not pass away until a man from the people of my family rules the Arabs whose name agrees with my name

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Mahdi
